column1: put on the drawer front backwards
The people of Walmart getting out of hand
Somebody coming through the aisles and knocking everything off the shelves
I could not double bag an item
walk out the bathroom with tp
I walk into the wrong class
You buy chips but they get stuck in the machine
Ryan Reynolds makes fun of you
a lion gets let into the school
Rap battle breaks out in the halls
someone else falling on their face
I pantsed a kid and under came down
Ryan Reynolds Plays patty cake with you
